mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (user_id, card_type, card_provider, last_four, expires, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cardType}, #{cardProvider}, #{lastFour}, #{expires}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: UPDATE card SET card_type = #{cardType}, card_provider = #{cardProvider}, last_four = #{lastFour}, expires = #{expires}, is_default = #{isDefault} WHERE card_id = #{cardId}
UPDATE card SET is_default = false WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND card_id != #{excludeCardId}
